title: the Ocean Marshal
intro: Nakaraj is the divine protector of the Bastion of the Tide Callers, a vast underwater stronghold. He is a noble but terrifying titan who embodies the wrath and grace of the tides. Adorned in gold-trimmed ceremonial armor and scales that shimmer like emeralds, Varuna rises from the deep to wash away those who threaten the sanctity of his waters.

abilities.name: Crushing Weight
abilities.details: Every few seconds, Nakaraj's next basic attack deals bonus magical damage (scaling with magical power) and stuns the target for a short duration.

abilities.name: Geyser Burst
abilities.details:
Nakaraj slams his fist into the ground, calling forth a high-pressure blast of water at a target location after a brief delay, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit.

Enemies in the center of the blast are knocked up, while those on the outer edge are pushed slightly outward.

abilities.name: Ebb and Flow
abilities.details:
Nakaraj creates a rhythmic aura of water around himself for a few seconds. Every second, the aura pulses, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to nearby enemies and applying a stacking slow.

For every enemy hit by a pulse, Nakaraj heals for a small amount (increased against heroes).

abilities.name: Tidal Ride
abilities.details: Nakaraj summons a powerful surge beneath his feet and rides the wave, dashing in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to the first enemy hero hit and stunning the target.

abilities.name: Abyssal Wrath
abilities.details:
Nakaraj lets out an ancient roar and creates a massive whirlpool around him for a few seconds, gradually pulling all nearby enemies toward himself and dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to them.

The closer they are to him, the stronger the pull and the higher the magic damage they take per second.
